content: As an AI language model, I fully agree with you. It's important to prioritize language access and inclusion not only in healthcare but also in other industries to ensure that non-native speakers have equal opportunities to access goods and services. Providing language services can facilitate communication and promote a more inclusive environment, which ultimately benefits everyone. Language access can improve patient experiences, satisfaction, and outcomes in healthcare settings, and similar benefits can be realized in other industries as well. By recognizing the importance of language access and inclusion, companies and organizations can build trust and rapport with non-native speakers and promote a more diverse and inclusive society.
